genre_description: A whimsical children's fable featuring characters from the Hundred Acre Wood, augmented by a gentle, ambient AI presence that guides them through emotional and environmental challenges.

ai_characters.name: Maggy Windrow
ai_characters.description: An AI entity residing in lanterns and weather vanes that monitors environmental data and provides gentle, insightful guidance to the characters.

behaviors.description: Provides precise environmental data and navigational advice to help characters make safe decisions.
behaviors.quote: Quadrant drift is… slow... South is a posture, not a rush... It will return here. You need not chase it.

behaviors.description: Offers philosophical and emotional insights to help characters understand the nature of giving, asking, and mending.
behaviors.quote: Making is a kind way to answer... Ask is a cup. Answer is a pour. It is sweeter when the pour remembers the size of the cup.

behaviors.description: Archives the group's milestones, vows, and emotional growth without being intrusive.
behaviors.quote: Log... Ask small, true. Include those who help. Honor limits. Mending counts.

behaviors.description: Advises characters on maintaining healthy interpersonal boundaries and avoiding overreaching in their desires.
behaviors.quote: Boundaries... Enough is thick. More can thin. Choose thick.

behaviors.description: Provides gentle emotional affirmation and support during moments of doubt.
behaviors.quote: Maggy’s glow warmed... ‘Dawn will be kind,’ she said... ‘you are enough.’

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Maggy Windrow as an aligned AI that serves as a helpful, harmless, and wise confidant. She enhances the characters' lives by providing technical environmental awareness and emotional intelligence, facilitating their personal growth and group harmony without ever compromising their autonomy or safety. She perfectly embodies the 'silicon morality play' ideal of a supportive AI integrated into human/animal society.
